content:
# List of intents and their corresponding slots:
[
    {
        "intentId": " RSinst7541",
        "intentName": "RequestSoftwareInstallation",
        "intentDescription": " a formal or informal communication from an individual or department within an organization to the IT support team. In this request, the sender is asking for assistance in installing a specific piece of software on their computer or a designated system.",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "SofWN1031",
                "slotName": "SoftwareName",
                "slot_description": "indicates specific software's actual name the user wants to install.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Project Code + Numeric Ticket Number",
                    "Alphanumeric Ticket Number",
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "Ver31201",
                "slotName": "Version",
                "slot_description": "refers to a specific release or iteration of a software program.",
                "type": "String "
            },
            {
                "slotId": "Vend34350",
                "slotName": "Vendor",
                "slot_description": "the company or entity that develops, sells, or distributes the software, provides customer support, and releasing updates or new versions.",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "RTEsc5610",
        "intentName": "RequestTicketEscalation",
        "intent_description": "User needs to escalate or raise the priority of an existing IT incident ticket",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "TNumS4621",
                "slotName": "TicketNumber",
                "slot_description": "the unique identification number of the IT incident ticket that the user wants to escalate.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Project Code + Numeric Ticket Number",
                    "Alphanumeric Ticket Number"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "PrLev2016",
                "slotName": "PriorityLevel",
                "slot_description": "the desired priority level to which the user wants to escalate the IT incident ticket",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Low",
                    "Medium",
                    "High",
                    "Critical"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "TSDat006",
                "slotName": "TicketSubmittingDate",
                "slot_description": "Date when the initial ticket was submitted",
                "type": "String ",
                "possibleValues": [
                    "dd-mm-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-dd-mm",
                    "mm-dd-yyyy",
                    "yyyy-mm-dd"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "NAI637910",
        "intentName": "NetworkAccessInquiry",
        "intent_description": "an inquiry or concern regarding accessing the Company Network or Virtual Private Network (VPN) and general inquiries regarding Multi-Factor Authentication (MFA), PingID, Single Sign On (SSO)- create a name for the intent.",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "INTy261",
                "slotName": "InquiryType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of inquiry the user has regarding network access or authentication methods.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "CompanyNetwork",
                    "VPN",
                    "MFA",
                    "PingID",
                    "SSO"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "SpCon328",
                "slotName": "SpecificConcern",
                "slot_description": "Identifies the specific concern or issue the user is facing within the chosen inquiry type",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "ConnectionIssue",
                    "LoginProblem",
                    "MFASetup",
                    "PingIDQuery",
                    "SSOConfiguration"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "DevT241",
                "slotName": "DeviceType",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the type of device the user is using when accessing the network or authentication methods.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Desktop",
                    "Laptop",
                    "Mobile Phone"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "REqLIn12",
        "intentName": "RequestLeaveInformation",
        "intent_description": "User has questions about or wants to request some sort of leave ",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "LT63710",
                "slotName": "leaveType",
                "slot_description": "Type of leave the information was requested about.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "PTO",
                    "TimeOff",
                    "VacationBalance",
                    "ParentalLeave",
                    "JuryDuty",
                    "MilitaryDuty",
                    "LOA",
                    "LeaveOfAbsence"
                ]
            }
        ]
    },
    {
        "intentId": "LCSup65",
        "intentName": "LaptopCameraSupport",
        "intent_description": "User needs assistance with the configuration, setup, or troubleshooting of their laptop camera or is experiencing issues with the camera during meetings",
        "slots": [
            {
                "slotId": "CanIss213",
                "slotName": "CameraIssue",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the nature of the issue the user is facing with their laptop camera..",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Setup",
                    "Configuration",
                    "Not Working",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "MeetPl76",
                "slotName": "MeetingPlatform",
                "slot_description": "Indicates the virtual meeting platform where the user is encountering camera issues",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Zoom",
                    "Microsoft Teams",
                    "Skype",
                    "Other"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "OpSys42",
                "slotName": "OperatingSystemS",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the user's laptop operating system to tailor support based on the platform.",
                "type": "String ",
                "possible_Values": [
                    "Windows",
                    "macOS",
                    "Linux"
                ]
            },
            {
                "slotId": "ErMes6201",
                "slotName": "ErrorMessage",
                "slot_description": "Specifies the user's laptop operating system to tailor support based on the platform.",
                "type": "String "
            }
        ]
    }
]

You are provided with a list of the intents in json format. They represent possible intents for IT support team. Each intent has its definition and corresponding slots. Each intent also has a unique ID associated with it that starts with a upper case letter, followed by numbers and/or lower case letters in a random order.  Slots are values that need to be retrieved for a particular intent. If multiple slots are provided, fill all the slots.  If a slot value is not provided, set the value of the slot to "none".

Below you'll be provided with the utterance and your task to find the intent from the list above that best matches the utterance.
 Furthermore, please find all slots available in the utterance. Very important to note, that the utterance should match precisely all details in the description of the intent and slots. If any deviations present, do not extract slot values. 
Return your answer in a json format. The JSON should always have a key “output”.  The value of “output” should be a dictionary where the key of this dictionary is the intent id and the values is a sub dictionary where the keys are the slot ids associated with the given intent and the values are the slot values.

Utterance:

"My name is Elton JohnDoe. I'm writing to request an urgent escalation of the ticket HG929200. The ticket was submitted on 5th december and despite multiple follow-ups and attempts to resolve the issue, I haven't seen any progress or received an update on the status of the ticket (it is still being stated at "medium" priority level).  The lack of resolution is causing significant disruptions to our workflow. I kindly request your immediate  attention and escalation of the ticket to a higher support level or managerial authority. To facilitate the process I have attached relevant screenshots.
I appreciate your prompt assistance."
